mean_en: to suggest a way of explaining something when you do not definitely know about it; to form a hypothesis
sentence: Darwin hypothesized that life evolves because better adapted life forms pass on their genes.
sentence_trans: 达尔文猜想，生命之所以会进化是因为更能适应环境的生物才能传递基因。
word_etyma: hypo助长 ＋ thes理论 ＋ ize动词后缀 → hypothesize假设，假定
